todos.title: Grocery Shopping
todos.body: Buy groceries for the week: milk, bread, eggs, and vegetables.

todos.title: Doctor's Appointment
todos.body: Annual check-up at the clinic. Bring insurance card.

todos.title: Finish Project Report
todos.body: Complete and submit the project report for the client by the end of the week.

todos.title: Car Maintenance
todos.body: Take the car for an oil change and tire rotation.

todos.title: Team Meeting
todos.body: Prepare presentation slides for the team meeting.

todos.title: Book Club
todos.body: Read chapters 4-6 of the assigned book for the next book club meeting.

todos.title: Plan Weekend Getaway
todos.body: Research and book a hotel for the weekend trip.

todos.title: Pay Utility Bills
todos.body: Pay electricity and water bills online before the due date.

todos.title: Renew Driver's License
todos.body: Visit the DMV to renew the driver's license before it expires.

todos.title: Client Feedback Session
todos.body: Schedule and conduct a feedback session with the client.

todos.title: Organize Garage
todos.body: Clean and organize the garage, donate unused items.

todos.title: Family Dinner
todos.body: Plan and cook a special dinner for the family gathering.
